intro_title: Your data - Your digital asset. Earn, control and protect your asset!
intro_desc: Protecting your privacy and monetizing by bringing innovative socio-economic opportunity.
whoweare_desc_1: MyDataCoin - is a Web3 social and innovative smart solution based on blockchain technology. It allows to earn for any Internet user on their data in the form of a new social,digital currency and control the data flow without any hassle.
whoweare_desc_2: It is an innovative solution that addresses current global socio-economic data challenges.
shareonlythedata_title: Share only the data you want.
shareonlythedata_desc_1: Self-Sovereign Identity tries to abolish multiple passwords. You just need to know your wallet password.
shareonlythedata_desc_2: Self-Sovereign Identity credentials can be verified anywhere, at any time. Even if the issuer does not exist anymore (with the exception of situations where the issuance of credentials happened using Private DIDs and the DID of the issuer was not written on the ledger).
ourvalues_privacy: Our solution will enhance privacy control and trust, transparency in a data flow, and fair distribution of digital dividends across the actors.
ourvalues_monetize: MyDataCoin will provide the mechanism to trade personal data on behalf of the owner without violating the right to data protection and privacy.
ourvalues_socailandsimple: It is a new colonial, digital coin, and digital solution to control the data flow through digital consent based on the digital trust ecosystem based on SSI.
powerfulandsecure_desc_1: High-performance, consistentcy, flexiblity, and secure consensus from The Tendermint Core.
powerfulandsecure_desc_2: A rich set of modules that address common concerns such as governance, tokens, other standards, and interactions with other blockchains from Cosmos SDK.
powerfulandsecure_desc_3: The IBC application layer is used to token transfers, interchain accounts, non-fungible token transfers and oracle data feeds.
ourmobileapp_desc: Managing your private data has become even easier than it has ever been. Use our mobile app to provide only the data you want.
ourmobileapp_yourdataexplorer_desc: User-friendly and intuitive interface for managing the privacy of your data
ourmobileapp_signingsmartcontracts_desc: Smart Contracts based on CosmWasm used for confidence in the transparency of the fulfillment of obligations
ourmobileapp_sendandrecive_decs: Less than 10 seconds to confirm a transaction with a price less than 0.01$
ourexperts_decs: Our team comprises digital transformation professionals with unique knowledge and experience.
our_powerful_partners_desc: Our partners contribute more than money.Their ideas, in-kind support and more are helping build better products.
